title: ISic000787. Epitaph for Ti. Claudius Claudianus
body:
1D(is) ❦ M(anibus) ❦
2Ti(berius) ❦ Cl(audius) Claudianus
3vix(it) ❦ ann(is) ❦ XIIII
4Cl(audius) ❦ Theseus ❦ pater
5filio ❦ dulcissimo

1D❦M❦
2TI❦CLCLAUDIANUS
3VIX❦ANN❦XIIII
4CL❦THESEUS❦PATER
5FILIO❦DULCISSIMO

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text according to IMusMessina 23

English translation

David Espinosa Espinosa

To the spirits of the departed. Tiberius Claudius Claudianus lived for 14 years. Claudius Theseus, his father, (set this up) to (his) sweetest son.

Italian translation

David Espinosa Espinosa

Agli spiriti dei defunti. Tiberius Claudius Claudianus visse per 14 anni. Claudius Theseus, suo padre, (ha predisposto questo) per (il suo) dolcissimo figlio.

commentary
